Posts.Content: Jul 21, 2008 04:11PM yankeebikachic wrote: Don't let it bother you--you are better than that. Most women have had nasty things said to them at one point or another, I have certainly had mine! I work by myself and worked thru all my treatments and believe me, having to explain yourself 30 times a day to clients is not a walk in the park. But it will make you stronger. Try to stay strong, Beth
Posts.Title: Very Angry! LisaG42 BessB
